You can use these in your response to make the product sound even better than it actually is. Here's an example for you:
"The BOSH! series of recipes from [NAME] has become a favorite among home cooks and foodies alike, thanks its simple yet delicious approach." * Simple Recipes *
* All Plants (BROS Series)
Categories: Books by Ingredient
Cookbooks

## The problem with this book...
The author seems too focused on quick meals that are easy but not particularly healthy or sustainable.
Some readers may find themselves missing out if they want something more substantial.

### A good cookbook when looking at meal planning ideas without having any dietary restrictions...

A great resource as long I don't have my own kitchen...

"Overall, a great [TYPE] for cooking with all plants. The recipes are easy to follow and the ingredients used in each dish make it accessible even if you're new at using them."
"BOSH! is an excellent resource that offers simple yet delicious food ideas made from common household vegetables."
